summary: This document is an email chain from December 2020 regarding the transfer of Ghislaine Maxwell's financial report appendices, including tax returns from 2015-2019, from her defense team to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. It details logistical arrangements for sharing the large file.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The financial report appendices and tax returns being transferred belong to her as part of her defense materials.

events.title: Transfer of Maxwell Financial Documents
events.description: Email correspondence arranging the transfer of Ghislaine Maxwell's financial report appendices and tax returns (2015-2019) from her defense team to the U.S. Attorney's Office.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team provided her financial report appendices to the U.S. Attorney's Office in December 2020.
The appendices included a 3GB zip folder containing tax returns for the years 2015 through 2019.
The email chain shows logistical coordination (using USAFx, DVDs, hard drives) to transfer the large file due to email size limitations.
The document indicates an active phase of evidence exchange in Maxwell's legal proceedings.
